title: New Signalling System fault near Ang Mo Kio

title_translations.zh-Hans: 宏茂桥附近新信号系统故障
title_translations.ms: Ralat Sistem Isyarat Baharu berhampiran Ang Mo Kio
title_translations.ta: Ang Mo Kio அருகே புதிய சிக்னலிங் அமைப்பு தவறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train svcs btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Sembawang have resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs have ended.
[NSL] UPDATE: Trains services are progressively being restored. Pls add 30mins train travel time btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Sembawang.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 45mins train travel time between #MarinaSouthPier & #Sembawang,due to a signalling system fault.Train svc is available.
[NSL]: Due to a New Signalling System fault near Ang Mo Kio, pls add 30mins travel time btwn #sembawang & #Marina South Pier.
